scripts.build: npx tsc && npx tsc-alias && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:staging: NODE_ENV=staging npx tsc && npx tsc-alias && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:main: NODE_ENV=production npx tsc && npx tsc-alias && npm run copy-assets
scripts.db-migrate:generate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate ./src/database/migrations/MyNewMigration -d src/config/data-source.ts
scripts.db-migrate:generate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx typeorm migration:generate ./database/migrations/MyNewMigration --outputJs -d config/data-source.js
scripts.db-migrate:generate:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npx typeorm migration:generate ./database/migrations/MyNewMigration --outputJs -d config/data-source.js
scripts.db-migrate:run: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run --dataSource src/config/data-source.ts
scripts.db-migrate:run:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx typeorm migration:run --dataSource config/data-source.js
scripts.db-migrate:run:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npx typeorm migration:run --dataSource config/data-source.js
scripts.build-and-seed:prod: npm run build:main && npm run db-seed:prod
